episode.title: The Greatest Mic Drop I’ve Ever Seen
episode.rawTitle: 152: ‘The Greatest Mic Drop I’ve Ever Seen’ With Guy English
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Guy English returns to the show. Topics include Ben Thompson’s argument that Apple’s functional organizational structure is hindering their efforts in online services, recalling our first Apple computers and the elegance of the classic Mac OS’s conceptual design, Prince (and his early use of Macs for creating music), emoji and exclamation marks, WWDC 2016, and yours truly’s youthful foray into on-the-job vandalism.
